Nightlight:

Nightlight smiled, she knew that Rodimus had to atttend his dutties, 
but she didn't like that he went to soon. She took the jewel that she 
had in her forehead, it was the only thing that decorate her and she 
put it in his hands, and said while she took that hand with her two 
hands "Take it,... take it with all my heart and my spark." 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> He heald her tight against him.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I see. I was curious but not jealous. I know that we 
have something together.
> 
> He kisses her.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I love you, Nightlight.
